description: The self-declared president of the Natsume and Ruka fanclub. She has a dog-cat Alice which gives her enhanced smell and hearing capabilities, as well as making her sprout cat whiskers and dog ears and promoting the desire to walk on all fours. Mikan also knows her brother as "seaweed head". Mikan also gave Sumire a nickname, Permy. However, only she, Kokoroyomi, and occasionally Natsume, used it.
name: Shouda Sumire
